mapper.sql: id, originalName, fileName, imgType, articleId, createTime, filePath
mapper.select: select id, fileName, imgType from tb_article_imgages where articleId = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id ASC
mapper.insert: insert into tb_article_imgages (id, originalName, fileName, imgType, articleId, createTime, filePath) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{originalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update tb_article_imgages
originalName = #{originalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imgType = #{imgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
articleId = #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
filePath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_article_imgages set originalName = #{originalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgType = #{imgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, articleId = #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, filePath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
